actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to provide for a Federal income tax credit for the cost of certain motor vehicles sold in the State of California.

summary.text: Provides for a Federal income tax credit for the cost of specified motor vehicle emission controls on 1975 model motor vehicles sold new in the State of California. Limits such credit to $300 per individual.

titles.title: A bill to provide for a Federal income tax credit for the cost of certain motor vehicles sold in the State of California.
